code: import{initGameState}from"../../constant";import actionTypes from"../actionTypes";export var updateCastling=function updateCastling(direction){return{type:actionTypes.CAN_CASTLE,payload:direction};};export var detectStalemate=function detectStalemate(){return{type:actionTypes.STALEMATE};};export var detectInsufficientMaterial=function detectInsufficientMaterial(){return{type:actionTypes.INSUFFICIENT_MATERIAL};};export var detectCheckmate=function detectCheckmate(winner){return{type:actionTypes.WIN,payload:winner};};export var setupNewGame=function setupNewGame(){return{type:actionTypes.NEW_GAME,payload:initGameState};};
